```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(simplecolors)
library(glue)
library(cranlogs)

pkgs <- read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rjake/pkg_monitor/master/data/pkg_data.csv"
)

pkg_colors <- 
  setNames(
    object = sc(pkgs$color), 
    nm = pkgs$package
  )


raw_logs <-
  cranlogs::cran_downloads(
    packages = pkgs$package,
    from = "2020-01-31"
  ) 

logs <- 
  raw_logs %>%
  group_by(package) %>% 
  filter( # the day before the first non-zero value
    count > 0 
    | date == min(ifelse(count > 0, date - 1, today()))
  ) %>% 
  ungroup()

max_30_day <- function(x) {
  ceiling(x / 30) * 30
}
```

```{r input_n}
renderUI({
  n_days <- max_30_day(as.integer(max(logs$date) - min(logs$date)))
  
  label <- 
    ifelse(
      input$x == "Inception",
      "Days from Start:",
      "Last # of Days:"
    )
    
    sliderInput(
      inputId = "n",
      label = label,
      min = 0,
      max = n_days,
      step = 10,
      value = c(0, 60)
    )
})
```

Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### 
```{r plot}
renderPlot({
  # base data ----
  df <-
    logs %>%
    filter(package %in% input$pkg) %>%
    mutate(date = floor_date(date, tolower(input$period))) %>% 
    count(package, date, wt = count, name = "count") %>%
    group_by(package) %>% 
    mutate(
      cummulative = cumsum(count),
      from_start = as.integer(date - min(date)),
      from_today = as.integer(today() - date) 
    ) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    mutate(y = get(tolower(input$y)))
  
  # last n days, days from start----
  if (input$x == "Inception") {
    df <-
      df %>% 
      mutate(x = from_start) %>% 
      filter(between(x, min(input$n), max(input$n)))
  } else {
    df <-
      df %>% 
      mutate(x = date) %>% 
      filter(between(from_today, min(input$n), max(input$n)))
  }
  
  # title ----
  pkg_deets <-
    df %>% 
    group_by(package) %>% 
    summarise(
      #min_date = format(min(date), format = "%m-%d-%Y"),
      min_n = ifelse(min(from_start) == 0, 0, min(cummulative)),
      max_n = max(cummulative),
      delta = max_n - min_n
    ) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    arrange(desc(max_n)) %>% 
    mutate(
      sentence = glue(
        "{package} +{delta} ({min_n} to {max_n})"
      )
    ) %>% 
    pull(sentence) %>% 
    glue_collapse("\n")
  
  # subtitle ----
  date_range <-
    paste(
      str_replace(
        format(range(df$date), format = "%b %e, %Y"),
        "  ", 
        " "
      ),
      collapse = " to "
    )

  
  # use geom ----
  # if (input$geom == "Smooth") {
  #   use_geom <- function(...) geom_smooth(se = FALSE, ...)
  # } else {
  #   use_geom <- geom_line
  # }
  
  # plot ----
  p <-    
    ggplot(df, aes(x, y, color = package)) +
      geom_line() +
      scale_color_manual(values = pkg_colors) +
      ylim(0, NA) +
      theme_minimal() +
      theme(
        panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
      ) +
      labs(
        title = pkg_deets,
        subtitle = date_range,
        x = paste("Distance from", input$x),
        y = input$y
      )
  
  if (input$period != "Day") {
    p <- p + geom_point()
  }
  
  p
})
```
